rules.prepare:
cd "$BOLT_SOURCE_DIR" bh_autotools_dev_update autoreconf -vfi
cp -a "$BOLT_SOURCE_DIR" "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR/python2" cp -a "$BOLT_SOURCE_DIR" "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR/python3" cp -a "$BOLT_SOURCE_DIR" "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR/libonly"
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" mkdir .mybin ln -sf "$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/python2.7" .mybin/python2.7 ln -sf "$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/python3.7" .mybin/python3.7 ln -sf "$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/${BOLT_HOST_TYPE}-pkg-config" \ .mybin/pkg-config
export PATH="$BOLT_BUILD_DIR/.mybin:$PATH"
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR/python2"
PYTHON_VERSION="2.7" \ CFLAGS="$CFLAGS" CPPFLAGS="$CPPFLAGS" LDFLAGS="-Wl,--as-needed $LDFLAGS" \ ./configure \ --prefix="$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX" \ --sysconfdir=/etc \ --build="$BOLT_HOST_TYPE" \ --host="$BOLT_HOST_TYPE" \ --disable-rpath \ --with-pyldns \ --with-pyldnsx \ --libdir="$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib"
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR/python3"
PYTHON_VERSION="3.7" \ CFLAGS="$CFLAGS" CPPFLAGS="$CPPFLAGS" LDFLAGS="-Wl,--as-needed $LDFLAGS" \ ./configure \ --prefix="$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX" \ --sysconfdir=/etc \ --build="$BOLT_HOST_TYPE" \ --host="$BOLT_HOST_TYPE" \ --disable-rpath \ --with-pyldns \ --with-pyldnsx \ --libdir="$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib"
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR/libonly"
PYTHON_VERSION="3.7" \ CFLAGS="$CFLAGS" CPPFLAGS="$CPPFLAGS" LDFLAGS="-Wl,--as-needed $LDFLAGS" \ ./configure \ --prefix="$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX" \ --sysconfdir=/etc \ --build="$BOLT_HOST_TYPE" \ --host="$BOLT_HOST_TYPE" \ --with-libunbound-only \ --disable-rpath \ --without-pyldns \ --without-pyldnsx \ --libdir="$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib"
rules.build:
export PATH="$BOLT_BUILD_DIR/.mybin:$PATH"
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR/python2" make -j"$BOLT_PARALLEL_JOBS"
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR/python3" make -j"$BOLT_PARALLEL_JOBS"
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR/libonly" make -j"$BOLT_PARALLEL_JOBS"
rules.install:
export PATH="$BOLT_BUILD_DIR/.mybin:$PATH"
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR/python2" make DESTDIR="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR" install
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR/python3" make DESTDIR="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR" install
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR/libonly" make DESTDIR="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR" install
install -d -m 0755 "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin"
PYTHON2="$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/python2" PYTHON3="$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/python3"
cd "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR" find . -name "*.la" -exec rm -f '{}' ';'
cd "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/python2.7" find . -name "*.py" -exec "$PYTHON2" -c "import py_compile; py_compile.compile('{}')" \; cd "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/python3" find . -name "*.py" -exec "$PYTHON3" -c "import py_compile; py_compile.compile('{}')" \;
